thread.section_title: Hotel Galileo - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Heart of Paris
thread.title_full: Heart of Paris - Review of Hotel Galileo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Tarekrzk
title: Heart of Paris
text:
Excellant location,In the heart of paris. Very close to the famous Champs elsyes street and walking distance to Tour Effil. The Metro station is just around the corner, Nice Morocoien restaurant just beside the hotel.
Very Friendly staff and descent room service
Elegant hotel, Goof Room Facilities but Small a little bit
